titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Memorial Quadrangle, Yale University, Photographs
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:05

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of photographs and pictures of Memorial Quadrangle at Yale, including interiors, exteriors, and a catalogue of decoration and ornament. Photographs of plans and architect's models are also included.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 46-B (YRG 46-B), Records and materials documenting individual Yale buildings, facilities, and grounds.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Memorial Quadrangle, Yale University, Photographs (RU 695). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are arranged by topic.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of photographs and pictures of Memorial Quadrangle at Yale, including interiors, exteriors, and a catalogue of decoration and ornament. Photographs of plans and architect's models are also included.

did.unittitle: Chimes-original ten bells prior to installation

odd.head: General
odd.p: See also: box 6, folder 84 See also: box 6, folder 87
